Name: Space of Darkness
About the game: Story Space of Darkness tells the story of a mechanic who works on a space station. The mechanic is alone on the ship for a few months. One day the power suddenly cuts off. He soon finds himself alone in the dark corridors of a space station. Can you unearth what truly happened on the space station? Are you able to find the small Space Ship and help the partner crew? About you are a mechanic who wants to find out what happened on the space station, it will be a little adventure that awaits him a space station full of unexpected surprises, explore, make quests, collect stuff and survive! Low-Poly Graphics Jump-Scares Loot Letters Enemys Hotbar Flashlight System Achievements and more!
